verses.roman:
svarūpera ṭhāṅi āche, laha tā likhiyā
vāsudeva ānandita pustaka pāñā

synonyms: svarūpera ṭhāṅi—in the possession of Svarūpa Dāmodara; āche—they are; laha—you take; tā—them; likhiyā—copying; vāsudeva—Vāsudeva; ānandita—very glad; pustaka—the books; pāñā—getting.
translation: "The books are kept with Svarūpa Dāmodara, and you can get them copied." Hearing this, Vāsudeva became very glad.
